item.title: ‘Metroid Prime 4’ Goes Open World And Finally Gets A December Release
item.description: It’s been a long road to get to the release of 'Metroid Prime 4', but we’re finally here, and December cannot come soon enough.

item.title: UFC Cuts Ties With Hard-Luck Former TUF Finalist
item.description: Austin Hubbard has been released from the UFC after a tough second stint that included a TUF finals run but ended on a losing streak.

item.title: The Estimated Purses For Canelo Alvarez Vs. Terence Crawford Fight Are Staggering
item.description: Canelo Alvarez and Terence Crawford are set for staggering paydays in Las Vegas. Here’s how much each star is reportedly earning for the fight.
